features.heading: Simple and Clear Overview
features.description: Provides real-time insights into the status of your tasks. Create, update, and delete boards and tasks with ease, putting you in complete control

features.heading: Subtask Management
features.description: Break down complex tasks into more manageable subtasks. Track progress with ease by marking them as completed

features.heading: Adaptable Themes
features.description: Switch between light and dark mode effortlessly, customizing the app's theme to suit your preferred visual environment

features.heading: Intuitive Drag-and-Drop
features.description: Enjoy the convenience of dragging and dropping tasks to change their status and re-order them within a column. You can add, rename and remove columns at any time to perfectly align with your project needs
